00008	static function string GetString( optional int Switch, optional PlayerReplicationInfo RelatedPRI_1, optional PlayerReplicationInfo RelatedPRI_2, optional Object OptionalObject )
00009	{
00010	    switch (Switch)
00011	    {
00012	      case 2: // Destroyed
00013	        return Default.ObjectifDestroyed;//@"("$MPBombingBase(OptionalObject).sBaseName$")"; break;
00014	      case 1: // Activated
00015	        return Default.BombIsActive;//@"("$MPBombingBase(OptionalObject).sBaseName$")"; break;
00016	      case 0: // Desactivated
00017	        return Default.BombIsDesactivated;//@"("$MPBombingBase(OptionalObject).sBaseName$")"; break;
00018	    }
00019	    return default.class$" ERR::RECEIVED GetString with wrong or undefined Params";
00020	}
